description: '''Keiji Haino''' ({{lang|ja|灰野 敬二}} ''Haino Keiji''; born May 3, 1952) is a Japanese musician and singer-songwriter whose work has included rock, [[free improvisation]], [[noise music]], percussion, [[psychedelic music]], [[minimal music|minimalism]] and [[drone music]]. He has been active since the 1970s and continues to record regularly and in new styles.
